entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 6:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -11.3°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas this evening. Wind becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
